name: Magic Beasties
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
Magic Beasties is a upcoming blockchain game about cute Beasties running on the Binance Smart Chain.
Collect Rare digital monsters, play with them, experience an adventure, trade and earn.
